name: Panda Dynasty
description:
Support me on patreon so I can keep developing this game.

Panda Dynasty is a furry visual novel that mix comedy, romance and thriller. You will embody a panda who can talk with spirits and see your life up side down when you meet Torito, an ex cop who search revenge against a strange cult, and Andrew, a clumsy tiger who needs help to found his mother. Meanwhile, you’ll have to deal with disappearance of your ghost father and all the mystery that sorround his death.

Both Andrew and Torito are datable characters, and you can change the story's course based on your choices. Get ready to dive in this furry, gay and crazy world!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first visual novel and game, I working barely alone and my native language is not english, so please, be gentle in any case of error or typo.

All scenarios provisional. I am terrible with drawing sceanarios, so I rasing money to commission an artist who can do better ones in the future.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Soundtrack taken from freemusicarchive.

All sprites, backgrounds, progamain and script by me (OrdinarySstar).

Made with Ren'Py.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you found any bug and issue or have any suggestion, you can contact me on my email ordinarysstar@gmail.com or in our discord server.
